meanings.definition: Used to express disgust or annoyance.
meanings.sent2: Yeesh, this traffic is really frustrating.
meanings.sent3: Yeesh, I can't believe I forgot my lunch again!
meanings.sent4: The taste of that medicine was like a yeesh in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the messy room was a yeesh for my eyes.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of exasperation or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Yeesh, why is this so complicated?
meanings.sent2: Oh yeesh, I can't believe I made that mistake.
meanings.sent3: Yeesh, I keep tripping over my own feet!
meanings.sent4: The constant noise was a yeesh in my ears.
meanings.sent5: The never-ending line at the store was a yeesh for my patience.
